greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Renewal array for central trinomial numbers A002426.
comment: Factors as (1/(1-x), x/(1-x))*(1/sqrt(1-4x^2), x/sqrt(1-4x^2)) [A007318*A111959]. Row sums are A111961. Diagonal sums are A111962. Inverse is A111963.
formula: Riordan array (1/sqrt(1-2x-3x^2), x/sqrt(1-2x-3x^2)); Number triangle T(n, k)=sum{j=0..n, C(n, j)*C((j-1)/2, (j-k)/2)*2^(j-k)*(1+(-1)^(j-k))/2};
results.author: _Paul Barry_, Aug 23 2005
